DataElement.preferredName: Derived Therapeutic Procedure Prior To Primary Sample Collection Begin Date Day Calculation Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numeric value to represent the date the therapy was started prior to the primary sample collection represented as a calculated number of days.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Therapeutic Procedure Prior To Primary Sample Collection Begin Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place._Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins._The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredName: Prior To First Specimen Collection Begin Date
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.:The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

Concepts.definition: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.
Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 2021-7-13 k Created for CCG HOPE-CARE derived CDE.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours._The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
The procedure or activity of determining something by mathematical or logical methods.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Calculation created for TCGA content requested by Dr. Ari Kahn.  This VD uses a calculation of dividing a value by the number of milliseconds in a day (86,400,000) to result in a number of days, stored as a whole number.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: CCG PTCL (Center for Cancer Genomics - Peripheral T Cell Lymphoma)
